page.title: 14The Shops in Oxted.
page.content: {Station Road East}is the main shopping street, it is built on a hill. Most people shop there. Some shops are in {Station Road West.}You can buy nearly all you need in Oxted. There are three supermarkets,{Sainsbury's, Fine Fare and{Budgens. Woolworth}is quite big, but it doesn't have a wide variety of clothes and toys. It is very good for plants and gardening things.{Boots the {Chemist}sells toiletries, photographs and medicines. A prescription costs Â£2.{White's Bazaar}is a lovely toy shop. You can buy games, toys, pencils and little plastic dolls. Just the place to spend pocket money.{Oxted {Gallery}is probably the strangest shop. It sells mugs, soaps, cushions and baskets all crowded together, a good place to chose a present. If you look up, the flats above the shops have interesting designs. by S. Pugh
